divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I just walked up the driveway after a trip to the store and he spotted this very bright, radiating orange object moving from the left side of his house to the right side of his house and then either faded into a red colored, tiny speck of light or zoomed in one direction extremely fast, making it seem like it was fading. Either way, the object was very close, did not make a sound and did not pulsate, but remained glowing.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart
There were no other sightings in Stuart on or around January 12th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very bright glowing/flaming orange object moving slowly over house
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
